Phobia speaking to Magmatron:
ah so you are the great and generous leader of this group. I am 
Phobia formerly of the warship Neutron. Your lackey uses great 
respect when stating your name. How many planets you must have 
conquered to demand such loyalty. I am truly in the presence of 
greatness. I only have one question Why have I not heard of you 
before?
--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Dachande85@a... wrote:
> ::Bazooka::
> 
>     "Right this way." Bazooka lead the way. "Commander Magmatron we 
have a 
> visitor."
>     "Understood. I am on my way." Magmatron replied. "Bring him to 
my 
> conference room."
> 
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> ::Magmatron::
> 
>     "You will have to excuse me for a moment. I have a new recruit 
to attend 
> to. I will have Bazooka operate the machine."
>     He entered the Conference room. "Bazooka report to the lab, you 
know what 
> must be done." Bazooka left. "Greetings. I am Magmatron. What is 
your name?"
